_7cd5k7cv9ka4qp0s.name: BINANCE SPOT USDT
_7cd5k7cv9ka4qp0s.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE:btcusdt.vbuy)
_vsell = (BINANCE:btcusdt.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="BN.S”)

_d2w8siglj8bhy2p3.name: Price
_d2w8siglj8bhy2p3.script:
var ohlc = options.useHeikinAshi ? 
    avg_heikinashi(bar) : 
    options.useGaps ? 
    avg_ohlc_with_gaps(bar) : 
    avg_ohlc(bar)

plotcandlestick(ohlc)
